findings.title: Potential cascading errors from rollbacks and user permissiveness
findings.description: There's a potential for cascading errors in a rollback scenario, which could lead to hidden failures from the user.

findings.title: Helm upgrade and rollback
findings.description: Potential cascading errors from rollbacks and user permissiveness.

findings.title: Decompression bombs
findings.description: Helm takes input from charts and is susceptible to overlapping files compression bomb but the implementation of a memory limit is not valid due to the variable nature of Helm releases and Kubernetes deployments.

findings.title: Chart repository index.yaml file allows for duplicate entries
findings.description: The chart repository `index.yaml` file consists of entries parsed by the `loadIndex` function into a mapping, which can't contain duplicate keys. However, when the index file contains duplicate entries, the last entry is parsed.
